content: If you have a product scanning incoming mail try disabling that feature or product. History shows most of these sorts of issues are caused by failed antivirus products.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Are you using IMAP? What is the retention period of junk with your chosen mail provider. Most of mine the provider deletes junk/spam after 14 days. But there is some variability provider to provider.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/userchromecss-js-usercontent-unsupported

To compound that I really have no idea what " I'd like to alter the style of the border and remove the annoying vertical bar on the left" means. Do you mean the one that delineates the change from the folder pane to the "list view" pane or is this something about the silly boxes mail is displayed in in the "card view"

You might want to have a look at the developer toolbox (Ctrl+Shift+I) in the inspector

content:
Quello che posso confermare è che molti utenti hanno segnalato di non riuscire più ad usare Thunderbird con la PEC di Poste.

Non c'è al momento alcuna iniziativa per supportarla in futuro. Sia perché la stragrande maggior parte degli sviluppatori di Thunderbird non è italiana, sia perché le risorse sono limitate.
